TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Dlfcn extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to the dynamic linker

remarks.para: The methods in this class are used to access the iOS/OSX dynamic linker. You can use the methods in this class to get a handle to native shared libraries and looking up public symbols from them as well as looking up constants defined in a dynamic library.
You can use dlopen to bring a library into memory and dlclose to close the library and dlerror to diagnose problems with calls to dlopen.
There are various methods exposed to look up constants from libraries (GetDouble, GetFloat, GetIndirect, GetInt32, GetIntPtr, GetNSNumber, GetStringConstant).

MemberSignature.Value: public static int dlclose (IntPtr handle);
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/usr/lib/libSystem.dylib" as "dlclose" winapi)int32 dlclose(native int handle) cil managed

Docs.param: Handle previously returned by dlopen
Docs.summary: Closes and unloads the native shared library referenced by the handle.
Docs.returns: A Unix error code, or zero on success.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string dlerror ();
.method public static hidebysig string dlerror() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a diagnostics message for the last failure when using any of the methods in this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static IntPtr dlopen (string path, int mode);
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/usr/lib/libSystem.dylib" as "dlopen" winapi)native int dlopen(string path, int32 mode) cil managed

Docs.param: Path to the dynamic library.
Bitmask, values defined in the Unix dlopen(2) man page.
Docs.summary: Loads the specified dynamic library into memory.
Docs.returns: The handle to the library, or IntPtr.Zero on failure.

MemberSignature.Value: public static IntPtr dlsym (IntPtr handle, string symbol);
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/usr/lib/libSystem.dylib" as "dlsym" winapi)native int dlsym(native int handle, string symbol) cil managed

Docs.param: Handle to the dynamic library previously opened with dlopen.
Name of the public symbol in the dynamic library to look up.
Docs.summary: Returns the address of the specified symbol in the dynamic library.

Docs.remarks: Use this to get a generic pointer to a public symbol in the library.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetArray (IntPtr handle, string symbol, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSArray array);
.method public static hidebysig void SetArray(native int handle, string symbol, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSArray array) cil managed

Docs.param: Handle to the dynamic library previously opened with dlopen.
Name of the public symbol in the dynamic library to look up.
Array to set, can be null.
Docs.summary: Sets the specific symbol in the library handle to point to the passed array.
Docs.remarks: The previous array is not released, it is up to you to release the handle to that array if you do not want it to leak.
